QuestData.Title: Thorium Point: The Seat of the Brotherhood
QuestData.Description: Did... did you see that? This is the missing piece we've been looking for! We have to take this information back to someone at Thorium Point.$b$bThe Dark Irons have been known to consort with the firelord in the past, but never before have they brought their kind this far out into Searing Gorge.$b$bThorium Point is west and north of here. You will find it nestled in the cliffs that overlook Pyrox Flats. Take this information straight to Overseer Oilfist.
QuestData.LogDescription: Report to Overseer Oilfist at Thorium Point in Searing Gorge.
QuestData.RewardText: Do I know you, $r?$b$b<Overseer Oilfist listens as you describe what you saw within the flames at Thorium Advance.>$b$bSounds like another one of Ragnaros' minions. I don't like the sound of that.
